description: Jepson's Oregon-grape (Berberis dictyota) is an incredible and unique species, with so much to offer. Its evergreen leaves provide year-round beauty and form a glossy wrap of light purplish-blue fruit in early summer. The fruits are edible in cooked form, and both fruits and leaves are high in vitamin C, making them an excellent nutritional addition to meals. It also has many medicinal qualities, and provides a perfect habitat for year-round wildlife such as birds, lizards, and bees. Its hardiness also makes it an ideal choice for growing in colder regions. Jepson's Oregon-grape is truly a remarkable species!
